datadog_logs_pipeline_order.description: Provides a Datadog logs pipeline order resource, which is used to manage the order of log pipelines.

name.description: The name attribute in the resource `datadog_logs_pipeline_order` needs to be unique. It's recommended to use the same value as the resource `NAME`.

pipelines.description: The pipeline IDs list. The order of pipeline IDs in this attribute defines the overall pipeline order for logs.
The `pipelines` list contains the IDs of resources created and imported by the
